動物用藥品名稱: ”日生研”雞傳染性華氏囊病活毒疫苗
業者名稱: 信超實業股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞傳染性華氏囊病。
ingredients: ATTENUATED MB-1.E STRAIN OF INFECTIOUS BURSAL DISEASE VIRUSPROPAGATED IN EMBRYONATED EGGS OF CHICKENS >=10^4.7 EID50LACTALBUMIN HYDROLYSATE 100 MG; PENICILLIN G POTASSIUM 200MCG;STREPTOMYCIN SULFATE 200MCG; DILUENT(LIQUID, PER 10ML);KH2PO4 1.8MG; PHENOL RED 0.25MG; NA2HPO4 7.57MG;DEIONIZED WATER......RESIDUAL VOLUME; GELATIN 12.5MG.每劑量至少含有弱毒傳染性華氏囊病病毒MB-1. E株 10^1.7 EID50每劑量（0.2ML）：發育雞卵培養弱毒傳染性華氏囊病病毒MB-1.E株 10^2.0EID50以上
